QuestData.Title: Malfunction at the West Sanctum
QuestData.Description: Since you're here, $n, I've a favor to ask you. Ley-Keeper Velania's apprentice dropped by earlier to ask for assistance. Apparently there's some malfunction happening at the West Sanctum. I've been a bit busy entertaining our... most pleasant... dwarven guest. See if you can give her a hand. You'll find the West Sanctum southwest of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ley-Keeper Velania at the West Sanctum in Eversong Woods.
QuestData.RewardText: Look around you. Things aren't exactly in order.$B$BWe have a severe malfunction at the West Sanctum. Let us do our best to prevent matters from getting worse.
